text: @Mike_Pence Bullshit. U don’t give a damn about sanctity of life. Ur party is willing 2 let everyone die of Coronavirus so u can reopen the economy & ur willing 2 let the elderly die 4 the same reason. Ur  pro fetus & anti woman & use abortion as a wedge issue.  Ur a sanctimonious hypocrite.
